summary: Implements a Stable Diffusion XL image‑to‑image diffusion pipeline that integrates ControlNet conditioning and optional adapter modules (such as LoRA and IP‑Adapter) to guide the denoising process using both visual control inputs and textual prompts. Includes utilities for handling latent representations and model loading.
business_intent: Provide developers and content creators with a flexible, high‑quality generative AI tool that can transform existing images according to user‑defined visual cues and textual descriptions, enabling applications in design, media production, and personalized content generation.
